materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of Maharajah Runjet Singh's Tomb in Lahore. The photograph features a grand, white building in the background, with a tall central dome and a smaller domed pavilion on the left. The foreground of the picture shows a clearing, with some vegetation and trees on the right. There is a flight of steps on the left of the photograph. In the center, there is an empty carriage. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Maharajah Runjeet Singh's Tomb, Lahore
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Lahore (Pakistan) Tombs Ranjit Singh, Maharaja of the Punjab, 1780-1839
